code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const VideoPair=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);const[currentPair,setCurrentPair]=useState(0);const[ratings,setRatings]=useState({});const[submitted,setSubmitted]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5000/videos").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setVideos(data));},[]);const handleVote=preferredVideoId=>{const userId=localStorage.getItem("user_id");const voteData={user_id:parseInt(userId,10),video1_id:videos[currentPair].id,video2_id:videos[currentPair+1].id,video1_rating:ratings.video1||0,video2_rating:ratings.video2||0,preferred_video_id:preferredVideoId};fetch("http://localhost:5000/vote",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(voteData)}).then(()=>{setSubmitted(true);alert("Thank you for voting!");});};if(submitted){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"You have submitted your votes. Thank you!"});}if(videos.length<2){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading videos..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Vote on Videos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:videos[currentPair].url,controls:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"1",max:"5",onChange:e=>setRatings({...ratings,video1:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleVote(videos[currentPair].id),children:"Prefer This"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:videos[currentPair+1].url,controls:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"1",max:"5",onChange:e=>setRatings({...ratings,video2:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleVote(videos[currentPair+1].id),children:"Prefer This"})]})]});};export default VideoPair;
